author: mjjoyce
msg: Updated directives.js for proper modal handling.
Minor indentation adjustments on Leaflet directive
"bootstrapModal" directive now uses "timeout" function instead of "defer"
Selecting the modal with jQuery now references the correct attribute
Fixed the incorrect class names that were being used for modal backdrop
-- "modalBackground" switched out for "modal-backdrop"
-- Changes were made to both the insertion and removal of the backdrop in
openModal and closeModal respectively
Minor syntax issues:
-- Function declarations weren't closed with a colon
-- Removal of modal-backdrop had incorrect css attribute 'diplay'
-- Modal hiding was broken because of css attribute 'display: hidden'
instead of 'display: none'
"bootstrapModal" return changes:
-- Now has replace value set so the substitution is performed correctly
-- Scope value now references modalId properly from the parent scope
with '@' instead of the deprecated syntax used previously.
"bootstrapModalOpen" directive changes:
-- The trigger call now properly passes the variables hasBackground and
hasEscapeExit
-- Minor beautifications

author: mjjoyce
msg: Index.html changes for proper modal functionality.
Updated tag and class names for the bootstrapModal directive
--Directive names must be in snake-case when mentioned in the html
--The incorrect class names were being used for the bootstrap settings
Added button to toggle dataset selection modal
